author: kvprasoon
body: Had issues with my old fork and it got deleted, this issue is to close #5435

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @kvprasoon Please rebase to get latest updates and pass CIs.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @kvprasoon Please correct the PR - it contains alien commits. It seems you update your fork but don't rebase like `git pull --rebase PowerShell master`.

comments.author: kvprasoon
comments.body: @iSazonov  I am not using cmdline, any  idea on how to do it via WEB UI ?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@kvprasoon It seems Web UI does not have the capability.
If you plan to continue work with GitHub best start is to install [GitHub Desktop](https://help.github.com/desktop/guides/getting-started-with-github-desktop/installing-github-desktop/) application. It automatically configure an environment for you. Then you can run Git bash from it and make rebase from command line.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @kvprasoon You need to learn Git docs and samples. I started out a year ago like you.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @kvprasoon We can not merge the PR until you rebase.

comments.author: kvprasoon
comments.body: Sorry @iSazonov , my fork is completely messed up, I would re-create and submit.

title: Added more helpful message for AmbiguousParameterSet exception
